title: Educator Resource Packet: Harvest Talk by Charles White
listing_description: Charles Wilbert White depicted the dignity of rural labor with two powerful figures. The contours of scythe, hat brims, and forearms echo the curves of the horizon and clouds, portraying these workers in harmony with the landscape.
copy: Charles Wilbert White depicted the dignity of rural labor with two powerful figures. The contours of scythe, hat brims, and forearms echo the curves of the horizon and clouds, portraying these workers in harmony with the landscape. This teaching packet includes an essay, discussion questions, activity ideas, and a glossary.
